gov.nasa.jpf.symbc.veritesting.ast.transformations.linearization

Class LinearizationTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.symbc.veritesting.ast.transformations.DefaultTransformation
      • gov.nasa.jpf.symbc.veritesting.ast.transformations.linearization.LinearizationTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformation

    public class LinearizationTransformation
extends DefaultTransformation
    Basic class that invokes Linearization transformation, by removing any if statement, and leaving only its "then" and "else" statements. It returns a new region that has been linearized.
